sentence.value: On September 28, 2007 the main belt asteroid 11430 (9560 P-L) was named after him and is now known as 11430 Lodewijkberg.
sentence.annotated-sentence: On [[September|September]] 28, 2007 [[the main belt asteroid|Asteroid_belt]] [[11430|11430_Lodewijkberg]] ([[9560|9560_Anguita]] P-L) was named after him and is now known as [[11430 Lodewijkberg|11430_Lodewijkberg]].

sentence.value: The asteroid was discovered October 17, 1960 by Cornelis Johannes van Houten and Ingrid van Houten-Groeneveld at Leiden Observatory, where they were studying photographic plates taken by Tom Gehrels using the Palomar Observatory's Samuel Oschin telescope.
